content.body: Hey folks, i am brushing up the invariants proposal repo to prep for presentation of a system near the end of the year
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Hey folks, i am brushing up the invariants proposal repo to prep for presentation of a system near the end of the year

content.body: I'd like to get more feedback on invariants that you consider important. They do not have to be "established" (as in, agreed with the whole committee). Instead, they should be existing aspects of the language that you consider important to maintain
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: I'd like to get more feedback on invariants that you consider important. They do not have to be "established" (as in, agreed with the whole committee). Instead, they should be existing aspects of the language that you consider important to maintain

content.body: this is fact finding, not "absolute" -- repo is here: https://github.com/codehag/documenting-invariants
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: this is fact finding, not "absolute" -- repo is here: https://github.com/codehag/documenting-invariants
